summary: Dammes offers extensive up-to-date working knowledge of enterprise wide business processes, ERP and EAM computer applications. His knowledge is based on over 15 years practical experience gained in the business software sector of the IT industry as Project Manager, Business Analyst/Consultant, Business Development Manager and Account Manager - after having spent several years in various senior management positions in the Telecommunications business. He is fully fluent in English and Dutch.
